title: Associations among screen time, sleep, mental health and cognitive functioning in school-aged children during the COVID-19 pandemic, November 2020 through to August 2022
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Eun Jung Choi, Diane Seguin, Amira Hmidan, Emma G. Duerden
